children.name: Code complexity
children.description: The computational complexity of the code: control, data, inheritance.

children.description: The computational complexity of the control flow structure in the code functions.

children.description: The complexity of the data flow structure in the code functions.

children.description: The complexity of the object-oriented architecture and structure. Composed of MDIT (maximum depth of inheritance tree).

children.description: Total number of public classes, interfaces, methods, constructors, annotations and attributes.

children.description: The amount of duplicated lines in the code.

How much the files are stable according to the SCM system. 
A file which has been heavily modified recently lacks experience, tests and feedback.
